summary: No explicit functional requirements were provided in the BuildRequest. The only change shown is an update to project_state.json, which adds/updates project metadata describing multiple features and REQ IDs unrelated to the stated goal of “Confirm direct portfolio link generation (no new code changes).”

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated project metadata enumerating multiple features and REQ IDs (e.g., REQ-1..REQ-5) that were not requested in this BuildRequest (which specifies no requirements).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists Requirements: none; however the diff introduces/updates a large set of feature descriptions and associated requirement IDs in project_state.json.
